meanings.sent1: She enjoys tinseling the Christmas tree every year.
meanings.sent2: They are tinseling the room for the holiday party.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried tinseling itself with shiny ribbons.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter tinsels the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The sun tinseling the water made it sparkle like diamonds.

meanings.definition: The act of adding tinsel to something.
meanings.sent1: The tinseling of the tree made it look festive.
meanings.sent2: She carefully removed the tinseling from the old decorations.
meanings.sent3: The tinseling on the cake added a touch of glamour.
meanings.sent4: His smile was like a warm tinseling on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The tinseling on her dress caught the light beautifully.
